item.description:
Please join us for a fun social mixer while raising money for a great cause! Our team is doing the 160 mile Bike Trek this October again and we need your support! Free food, drink specials from Dos Equis, free drink specials from 7-8PM from Absolut, and we will hold a huge silent auction with some fabulous items.

We will be in the private room of Red Sky Restaurant to mix and mingle, in the back area. Come for a drink and munchies, see old friends, meet new ones and support an important cause.

$5 cover at private room entrance-cash only. All proceeds from the party will be donated to the American Lung Association. We will be taking credit cards for the auction items.

Hope you can stop by!

If you can't make the party please take a moment and donate what you can to help us get to our goal: http://www.mrsnv.com/...
Additionally, if you are up for the challenge, JOIN our team of guys and gals. Last year was an amazing experience and it may sound difficult--but it wasn't that hard. There are a ton of activities after each day including a lobster dinner--it makes it all worth it! Come train with the team!
Join here: http://www.mrsnv.com/...

This is posted on multiple meetup groups so please only RSVP once. Thanks!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing angel wings-come meet the team
item.name: Social mixer to raise funds for the American Lung Association
